!4 List
 * '''Case 1''': User1 should be able to list records with any visibility with a permission unit they have access to (permissionUnit1)
 * '''Case 2''': A guest should only be able to list published records regardless of permission unit they have access to (none)
 
!***> '''Case 1''' User1 should be able to list records with any visibility
!define currentAuthToken {$adminAuthToken}
!define recordType {fitnesseRecordTypeWithVisibility}
!define expectedResponseRegex {$commonUnpublishedRecordId AND $commonPublishedRecordId AND "name":"fitnesseTextVar","value":"entext"}

!include -seamless .CoraTests.CallThroughJavaCode.BuiltInMetadata.BuiltInMetadataFunctionality.Visibility.User.ActionHelpers.ListRecordsAndEnsureResponse

*!
!***> '''Case 2''' A guest should only be able to list published records
!define currentAuthToken {$guestAuthToken}
!define expectedResponseRegex {$commonPublishedRecordId AND NOT $commonUnpublishedRecordId AND NOT "name":"visibility","value":"unpublished" AND NOT "name":"fitnesseTextVar","value":"entext"}

!include -seamless .CoraTests.CallThroughJavaCode.BuiltInMetadata.BuiltInMetadataFunctionality.Visibility.User.ActionHelpers.ListRecordsAndEnsureResponse
*!
